throb.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a part of your body throbs, you have a feeling of pain in it that regularly starts and stops
throb.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The back of my neck throbbed painfully.
I woke up with a throbbing headache.
Her foot was throbbing with pain.
throb.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if music or a machine throbs, it makes a low sound or vibration with a strong regular beat
throb.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: if your heart throbs, it beats faster or more strongly than usual
throb.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: if a place throbs with life, energy etc, it has a lot of life etc
throb.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: The river is throbbing with life.
throb.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a low strong regular beat or sensation
